title: Prabowo Fury on Market Rout Shows Growing Divisions in Indonesia
description: Indonesia’s president ordered the firings of regulators after warnings about MSCI’s concerns went unheeded.
content: Indonesia’s president ordered the firings of regulators after warnings about MSCI’s concerns went unheeded.
